On this page we discuss about new ideas for phpDays. Post your ideas below on page in comments.

=== Validator ===

[EnLibDaysValidate Days_Validate] - check variable by criterias and return `true` only if data valid.

{{{
$age = 21;
$mail = 'Tom@Jerry.com';
// not good format of criteria
if (Days_Validator::check($age, array('int'=>array('max'=>50, 'min'=>18))))
  echo 'You are full of strength!';
// good format of criteria
if (Days_Validator::check($age, 'int: {max: 50, min: 18}'))
  echo 'You are full of strength!';
// many criterias
if (Days_Validator::check($mail, 'str: {max: 70}, email, required'))
  echo 'Name correct!';
}}}

Tasks:
 * simplify criteria format _(good if data passes as string `check($age, 'int: {max: 50, min: 18}')` or similar format)_

=== Event ===

[EnLibDaysEvent Days_Event] - implementation of Observer pattern. Help join many components to one system without changes in any component.

In code we insert calls:
{{{
...
  public function login($username, $password) {
    Days_Event::run('user_login_before');
    // process loginning
    if ('user logged successfully') {
      Days_Event::run('user_login_success');
      ...
    }
    else {
      Days_Event::run('user_login_fail');
      ...
    }
    Days_Event::run('user_login_after');
  }
...
}}}

Now, we have add to site forum with user autorization. We use events in forum.
{{{
Days_Event::add('user_login_success', 'userSuccessLogged');
// function called on success logging
function userSuccessLogged() {
  echo 'You logged successfully on forum!';
}
}}}
